      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c84b64df-029a-4b86-9b11-851d1ee0f04d#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">13. Hunyadi-huszárezred</string>
            <string language="en">The 13th Hunyadi cavalry regiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das 13. Hunyadi Kavallerieregiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le 13ème régiment de cavalerie de Hunyadi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O 1ó regiment da cavalaria de Hunyadi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tredicesimo regiment del cavalry di Hunyadi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το 13$ο σύνταγμα ιππικού Hunyadi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El décimotercero regimiento de la caballería de 
Hunyadi</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fekete kalapos, kékruhás lovas</string>
            <string language="en">Horseman dressed in blue wearing a black hat</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hunyadi fekete kalap Viktória-dolmány,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hunyadi black hat Victoria-pelisse</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reiter kleidete im Blau an, das einen schwarzen 
Hut trägt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cavalier s'est habillé dans le bleu portant 
un chapeau noir</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O horseman vestiu-se no azul que desgasta um 
chapéu preto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il horseman si è vestito in azzurro che porta un
cappello nero</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ιππέας έντυσε στο μπλε φορώντας ένα μαύρο καπέλο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El jinete vistió en el azul que desgastaba un 
sombrero negro</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hunyadi schwarzer Hut Victoria-pelisse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapeau noir Victoria-pelisse de Hunyadi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chapéu preto Victoria-pelisse-pelisse de Hunyadi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cappello nero Victoria-pelisse di Hunyadi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαύρος Βικτώρια-μανδύας καπέλων Hunyadi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sombrero negro Victoria-pelisse-pelisse de Hunyadi</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
